name: Life or Reach
description:
A fighting game where you can control your reach! ?

During the match, in exchange for your own health

You can extend the reach of your weapon!

If you extend your reach, you will be more likely to be defeated, but

You can instantly overcome situations where you are at a disadvantage!

You can also shorten the extended reach, so use it depending on the battle situation!

"It will make you more likely to die, but it will increase your reach..."

"I'm at a disadvantage in terms of distance, but I'll try to conserve my stamina..."

It's interesting how both of them keep being caught between choices that are likely to lead to victory!

The feeling of pleasure when the decision you made after thinking about it directly leads to victory is exceptional!

Gain a new sense of victory by flexibly adjusting your reach according to your opponent's actions!
